overview: The Song family, which is famous for its "Song God Wine", was full of shadows in the ancient well in the backyard. On a night of black and high winds, the long-haired female ghost climbed out of the well, frightening the maids who came to Shangxiang to pay homage, causing anxiety in the whole government. . When Li Gui returned home, the grandma, who knew she was at a loss, had to send a distress signal to the local police station in an attempt to get help from the police station's "ghost hunter". In desperation, the police station had to send someone to find out. When inspector Qiao Hu and police Huamu Xiaoqing came to the backyard of Song's house, he found nothing but a deadly dead man in Gujing. I thought that the matter was about to come to an end, but Master Song was assassinated when everyone had alibi. The two policemen who came with the ghost hunt mission began to make real arrangements to investigate the death mystery. .
title: Mystery Case Of Deep House
